name: Impossible Arena
description:
Ancient china, Ming Dynasty. Every six years, the emperor hold an arena and fighters around the country joined the arena. The winners of the arena was appointed as personal bodyguard of the emperor and heavily rewarded. In the arena, the participant have to fight with high skilled "Royal Guards". The arena itself had no name but peoples are called  "Impossible Arena".

The young fighter named "Blue Dragon" come and try to compete the arena. Will he become a bodyguard?

This game is one of the entry of SBIG Jam 2020.
